module.name: versionconsts
module.short: Contains constants used by version information resource

descr.p: This unit contains constants used by TVersionResource.
Constants for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags:
Constants for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS:
Constants for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType:
Constants for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType:

element.name: VS_FF_DEBUG
element.short: The file contains debugging information

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags.

element.name: VS_FF_PRERELEASE
element.short: This file is a development version

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags.

element.name: VS_FF_PATCHED
element.short: This file is not the original shipped one

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags.

element.name: VS_FF_PRIVATEBUILD
element.short: This file is a private build

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags.
When this flag is set, a TVersionStringTable in TVersionResource.StringFileInfo should contain an item with PrivateBuild as key.

element.name: VS_FF_INFOINFERRED
element.short: This flag should never be used in a resource

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags.

element.name: VS_FF_SPECIALBUILD
element.short: This file is a special build of the standard one

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags.
When this flag is set, a TVersionStringTable in TVersionResource.StringFileInfo should contain an item with SpecialBuild as key.

element.name: VS_FFI_FILEFLAGSMASK
element.short: The valid bits for file flags

descr.p: This constant is used mainly for TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlagsMask to signal which bits are used in TVersionFixedInfo.FileFlags field.

element.name: VOS_UNKNOWN
element.short: This file was designed to run on an unknown operating system

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_DOS
element.short: This file was designed for MS-DOS

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_OS216
element.short: This file was designed for 16 bit OS/2

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_OS232
element.short: This file was designed for 32 bit OS/2

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_NT
element.short: This file was designed for Windows NT

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS__BASE
element.short: No subsystem specified

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS__WINDOWS16
element.short: This file was designed for 16-bit Windows

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS__PM16
element.short: This file was designed for 16-bit Presentation Manager

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS__PM32
element.short: This file was designed for 32-bit Presentation Manager

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS__WINDOWS32
element.short: This file was designed for 32-bit Windows

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_DOS_WINDOWS16
element.short: This file was designed for 16-bit Windows on MS-DOS

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_DOS_WINDOWS32
element.short: This file was designed for 32-bit Windows on MS-DOS

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_OS216_PM16
element.short: This file was designed for 16-bit Presentation Manager on 16-bit OS/2

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_OS232_PM32
element.short: This file was designed for 32-bit Presentation Manager on 32-bit OS/2

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VOS_NT_WINDOWS32
element.short: This file was designed for 32-bit Windows NT

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileOS.

element.name: VFT_UNKNOWN
element.short: File type is unknown

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.

element.name: VFT_APP
element.short: The file is an application

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.

element.name: VFT_DLL
element.short: The file is a dynamic link library

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.

element.name: VFT_DRV
element.short: The file is a device driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.
The device driver type is specified in TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType.

element.name: VFT_FONT
element.short: The file is a font

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.
The font driver type is specified in TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType.

element.name: VFT_VXD
element.short: The file is a virtual device

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.

element.name: VFT_STATIC_LIB
element.short: The file is a static link library

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileType.

element.name: VFT2_UNKNOWN
element.short: File subtype is unknown

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType.

element.name: VFT2_DRV_PRINTER
element.short: The file is a printer driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_KEYBOARD
element.short: The file is a keyboard driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_LANGUAGE
element.short: The file is a language driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_DISPLAY
element.short: The file is a display driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_MOUSE
element.short: The file is a mouse driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_NETWORK
element.short: The file is a network driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_SYSTEM
element.short: The file is a system driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_INSTALLABLE
element.short: The file is an installable driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_SOUND
element.short: The file is a sound driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_DRV_COMM
element.short: The file is a communications driver

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_FONT_RASTER
element.short: The file is a raster font

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_FONT_VECTOR
element.short: The file is a vector font

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .

element.name: VFT2_FONT_TRUETYPE
element.short: The file is a TrueType font

descr.p: This constant is used for TVersionFixedInfo.FileSubType when TVersionFixedInfo.FileType is .
